title: Harmonized Index of Consumer Prices: Motor Cars for Portugal
notes:
The Harmonized Index of Consumer Prices category "Motor Cars (07.1.1)" is a classification of durable goods that includes new motor cars, passenger vans, station wagons, estate cars, and the like with either two-wheel drive or four-wheel drive; second-hand motor cars, passenger vans, station wagons, estate cars, and the like with either two-wheel drive or four-wheel drive.

This category excludes invalid carriages (06.1.3), camper vans (09.2.1), golf carts (09.2.1).

This category is a subcategory of the Transport (07) and of Purchases of Vehicles (07.1) category.

Information provided in the notes pertaining to HICP classifications can be found from the source at: http://ec.europa.eu/eurostat/cache/metadata/en/prc_hicp_esms.htm.
